CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: javelin
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A heavy steel tip attached to a long wooden pole, packing a very strong punch against scarcely armored targets.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: stone arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A sharpened stone is attached as an arrow head. Cuts exposed tissue fairly well but is ineffective against any kind of armor.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: steel arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: The arrow head is made from steel to enhance armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: plasteel arrow
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: Fitted with a plasteel head to maximize armor penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: stone sling bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A streamlined stone designed to fly far and hit hard. Not particularly effective against armour.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: steel sling bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A refiined sling bullet made out of steel to slightly increase impact, and armour penetration.

CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.label: plasteel sling bullet
CombatExtended.AmmoCategoryDef.description: A highly-refined sling bullet made out of plasteel to slightly increase impact, and significantly improve armour penetration.
